69B0AD1D41EF2B51B981679459F8E0C7: On receiving an event, disables the device.
ED82D71E4A250CFB017FE59E953D22DE: On receiving an event, enables the device.
85184ADA41ED865BC0EEAC8ED2EB47A1: Send a custom message to the message feed.
BC4B6D8A4F622BA10A4216859DFF2902: Send a custom message to the message feed.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.PlayerHighlight: A color specifically applied to {PlayerName} markup.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.Activate.Descri: Displays the message in the message feed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.InvertActivated: If set, Activated by Class filter is inverted.
If set, Activated by Team filter is inverted.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.InvertMessageVi: If set, inverts the Message Visibility By Class filter.
If set, inverts the Message Visibility filter.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.ActivatedByClas: Instigating player must be of this class to trigger a message.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.ActivatedByTeam: Instigating player must be on this team to trigger a message.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.Message.Descrip:
Message to display.
Custom tags such as {PlayerName} and {Icon} are supported.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.Disable.Descrip: On receiving an event, disables the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.Enable.Descript: On receiving an event, enables the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.MessageVisibili: Only players of this class will see the message.

Specify a Team ID, or use Friendlies or Enemies.
You can also choose to have the message show only for the Triggering Player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.MessageColor.De: The color applied to the text.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_EliminationFeed_C.MessageIcon.Des: Use {Icon} to insert this icon into the message.
Whether the device is enabled by default.
